channel.title: A Refreshing Development Experience Awaits...
channel.description:
Application development is slow, it’s inefficient, there’s high overhead, customization & maintenance are a mess, it’s hard to scale, tough to secure, a challenge to avoid vendor lock-in, and you’re dependent on the success of the platforms you build upon.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/a-refreshing-development-experience-awaits/
